00030 #define HANDLE_INT( x ) if ( status & x ) { Handle_##x(); status &= ~x; }

00032 #define FIFO_TXSTS_HCNUM_MASK  0x78000000
00033 #define FIFO_TXSTS_HCNUM_SHIFT 27

00041 /*
00042  * USB_IRQHandler() is the first level handler for the USB peripheral interrupt.
00043  */
00044 void USB_IRQHandler( void )
00045 {
00046   uint32_t status;
00047 
00048   INT_Disable();
00049 
00050   status = USBHAL_GetCoreInts();
00051   if ( status == 0 )
00052   {
00053     INT_Enable();
00054     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "\nSinT" );
00055     return;
00056   }
00057 
00058   HANDLE_INT( USB_GINTSTS_HCHINT     )
00059   HANDLE_INT( USB_GINTSTS_PRTINT     )
00060   HANDLE_INT( USB_GINTSTS_DISCONNINT )
00061 
00062   INT_Enable();
00063 
00064   if ( status != 0 )
00065   {
00066     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "\nUinT" );
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 /*
00071  * Handle host channel IN transfer interrupt.
00072  */
00073 static void Handle_HcInInt( uint8_t hcnum )
00074 {
00075   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc;
00076   USB_Status_TypeDef result;
00077   uint32_t status, hcchar, eptype;
00078 #ifdef DEBUG_USB_INT_HI
00079   uint32_t status2;
00080 #endif
00081 
00082   hc = &hcs[ hcnum ];
00083   status = USBHHAL_GetHcInts( hcnum );
00084   hcchar = USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR;
00085   eptype = hcchar & _USB_HC_CHAR_EPTYPE_MASK;
00086 
00087   DEBUG_USB_INT_HI_PUTCHAR( 'i' );
00088 
00089   if ( status & USB_HC_INT_CHHLTD )
00090   {
00091     USB->HC[ hcnum ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00092 
00093 #ifdef DEBUG_USB_INT_HI
00094     status2 = status;
00095 #endif
00096     status &= USB_HC_INT_XFERCOMPL | USB_HC_INT_STALL | USB_HC_INT_XACTERR |
00097               USB_HC_INT_ACK | USB_HC_INT_NAK | USB_HC_INT_DATATGLERR |
00098               USB_HC_INT_BBLERR;
00099 
00100     if ( ( status & ( USB_HC_INT_ACK | USB_HC_INT_XFERCOMPL ) ) ==
00101          ( USB_HC_INT_ACK | USB_HC_INT_XFERCOMPL              )    )
00102     {
00103       DEBUG_USB_INT_HI_PUTCHAR( 'c' );
00104 
00105       hc->xferred = hc->hwXferSize -
00106                     ( ( USB->HC[ hcnum ].TSIZ & _USB_HC_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_MASK ) >>
00107                       _USB_HC_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT );
00108 
00109       hc->remaining -= hc->xferred;
00110       hc->ep->toggle = ( USB->HC[ hcnum ].TSIZ & _USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_MASK ) ==
00111                        USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_DATA0 ? USB_PID_DATA0 : USB_PID_DATA1;
00112 
00113       result = USB_STATUS_OK;
00114     }
00115 
00116     else if ( status & USB_HC_INT_STALL )
00117     {
00118       result = USB_STATUS_EP_STALLED;
00119       DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "StaL" );
00120     }
00121 
00122     else if ( status & USB_HC_INT_BBLERR )
00123     {
00124       result = USB_STATUS_EP_ERROR;
00125       DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "BabL" );
00126     }
00127 
00128     else if ( ( ( status &
00129                   ( USB_HC_INT_DATATGLERR | USB_HC_INT_NAK ) )
00130                 == USB_HC_INT_DATATGLERR                       ) &&
00131               ( !( hc->status & HCS_TIMEOUT )                  )    )
00132     {
00133       /* Toggle error but not nak or timeout */
00134       result = USB_STATUS_EP_ERROR;
00135       DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "TglE" );
00136 
00137       hc->errorCnt++;
00138       if ( hc->errorCnt < 3 )
00139       {
00140         USBHHAL_HCStart( hcnum );
00141         return;
00142       }
00143     }
00144 
00145     else if ( ( ( status &
00146                   ( USB_HC_INT_DATATGLERR | USB_HC_INT_NAK |
00147                     USB_HC_INT_XACTERR )                       )
00148                 == USB_HC_INT_XACTERR                            ) &&
00149               ( !( hc->status & HCS_TIMEOUT )                    )    )
00150     {
00151       /* Exact error but not toggle err or nak or timeout */
00152       result = USB_STATUS_EP_ERROR;
00153       DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "XacT" );
00154 
00155       hc->errorCnt++;
00156       if ( hc->errorCnt < 3 )
00157       {
00158         USBHHAL_HCStart( hcnum );
00159         return;
00160       }
00161     }
00162 
00163     else if ( hc->status & HCS_TIMEOUT )
00164     {
00165       DEBUG_USB_INT_HI_PUTCHAR( 't' );
00166       result = USB_STATUS_TIMEOUT;
00167     }
00168 
00169     else
00170     {
00171 #ifdef DEBUG_USB_INT_HI
00172       if ( !( ( eptype == HCCHAR_EPTYPE_INTR                  ) &&
00173               ( ( status & USB_HC_INT_NAK ) == USB_HC_INT_NAK )    ) )
00174         {
00175           USB_PRINTF( "0x%08lX", status2 );
00176         }
00177 #endif
00178       return;
00179     }
00180 
00181     if ( eptype == HCCHAR_EPTYPE_CTRL )
00182       USBHEP_CtrlEpHandler( hc->ep, result );
00183     else
00184       USBHEP_EpHandler( hc->ep, result );
00185   }
00186 }

00188 /*
00189  * Handle host channel OUT transfer interrupt.
00190  */
00191 static void Handle_HcOutInt( uint8_t hcnum )
00192 {
00193   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc;
00194   USB_Status_TypeDef result;
00195   uint32_t status, hcchar, eptype;
00196 #ifdef DEBUG_USB_INT_HI
00197   uint32_t status2;
00198 #endif
00199 
00200   hc = &hcs[ hcnum ];
00201   status = USBHHAL_GetHcInts( hcnum );
00202   hcchar = USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR;
00203   eptype = hcchar & _USB_HC_CHAR_EPTYPE_MASK;
00204 
00205   DEBUG_USB_INT_HI_PUTCHAR( 'o' );
00206 
00207   if ( status & USB_HC_INT_CHHLTD )
00208   {
00209     USB->HC[ hcnum ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00210 
00211 #ifdef DEBUG_USB_INT_HI
00212     status2 = status;
00213 #endif
00214     status &= USB_HC_INT_XFERCOMPL | USB_HC_INT_STALL | USB_HC_INT_XACTERR |
00215               USB_HC_INT_ACK | USB_HC_INT_NAK;
00216 
00217     if ( ( status & ( USB_HC_INT_ACK | USB_HC_INT_XFERCOMPL ) ) ==
00218          ( USB_HC_INT_ACK | USB_HC_INT_XFERCOMPL              )    )
00219     {
00220       DEBUG_USB_INT_HI_PUTCHAR( 'c' );
00221 
00222       hc->xferred   = hc->remaining;
00223       hc->remaining = 0;
00224       hc->ep->toggle = ( USB->HC[ hcnum ].TSIZ & _USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_MASK ) ==
00225                        USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_DATA0 ? USB_PID_DATA0 : USB_PID_DATA1;
00226 
00227       result = USB_STATUS_OK;
00228     }
00229 
00230     else if ( status & USB_HC_INT_STALL )
00231     {
00232       result = USB_STATUS_EP_STALLED;
00233       DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "StaL" );
00234     }
00235 
00236     else if ( status & USB_HC_INT_XACTERR )
00237     {
00238       DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "XacT" );
00239       if ( status & ( USB_HC_INT_ACK | USB_HC_INT_NAK ) )
00240       {
00241         hc->errorCnt = 0;
00242         USBHHAL_HCStart( hcnum );
00243         return;
00244       }
00245       else
00246       {
00247         hc->errorCnt++;
00248         if ( hc->errorCnt < 3 )
00249         {
00250           USBHHAL_HCStart( hcnum );
00251           return;
00252         }
00253       }
00254       result = USB_STATUS_EP_ERROR;
00255     }
00256 
00257     else if ( hc->status & HCS_TIMEOUT )
00258     {
00259       DEBUG_USB_INT_HI_PUTCHAR( 't' );
00260       result = USB_STATUS_TIMEOUT;
00261     }
00262 
00263     else
00264     {
00265 #ifdef DEBUG_USB_INT_HI
00266       if ( !( ( eptype == HCCHAR_EPTYPE_INTR                  ) &&
00267               ( ( status & USB_HC_INT_NAK ) == USB_HC_INT_NAK )    ) )
00268         {
00269           USB_PRINTF( "0x%08lX", status2 );
00270         }
00271 #endif
00272       return;
00273     }
00274 
00275     if ( eptype == HCCHAR_EPTYPE_CTRL )
00276       USBHEP_CtrlEpHandler( hc->ep, result );
00277     else
00278       USBHEP_EpHandler( hc->ep, result );
00279   }
00280 }
00281 
00282 /*
00283  * Handle port disconnect interrupt.
00284  */
00285 static void Handle_USB_GINTSTS_DISCONNINT( void )
00286 {
00287   int i;
00288   uint32_t hcchar;
00289 
00290   USB->GINTSTS = USB_GINTSTS_DISCONNINT;
00291   USB->HAINTMSK = 0;
00292 
00293   USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_DISCONNECTED;
00294   USBTIMER_Stop( HOSTPORT_TIMER_INDEX );
00295   USBHHAL_PortReset( false );
00296 
00297   for ( i=0; i< NUM_HC_USED + 2; i++ )
00298   {
00299     hcchar = USB->HC[ i ].CHAR;                 /* Halt channel             */
00300     USBHHAL_HCHalt( i, hcchar );
00301     USB->HC[ i ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;              /* Clear pending interrupts */
00302 
00303     if ( !hcs[ i ].idle )
00304     {
00305       USBHEP_TransferDone( hcs[ i ].ep, USB_STATUS_DEVICE_REMOVED );
00306     }
00307   }
00308 
00309   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "\nDisC" );
00310 }
00311 
00312 /*
00313  * Handle host channel interrupt. Call IN and OUT transfer handlers as needed.
00314  */
00315 static void Handle_USB_GINTSTS_HCHINT( void )
00316 {
00317   uint8_t hcnum;
00318   uint32_t hcints, hcmask;
00319 
00320   hcints = USBHHAL_GetHostChannelInts();
00321 
00322   for ( hcnum = 0,               hcmask = 1;
00323         hcnum < NUM_HC_USED + 2;
00324         hcnum++,                 hcmask <<= 1 )
00325   {
00326     if ( hcints & hcmask )
00327     {
00328       if ( USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR & USB_HC_CHAR_EPDIR )
00329       {
00330         Handle_HcInInt( hcnum );
00331       }
00332       else
00333       {
00334         Handle_HcOutInt( hcnum );
00335       }
00336     }
00337   }
00338 }
00339 
00340 /*
00341  * Callback function for port interrupt state machine.
00342  * Called on timeout of the port timer when a port reset is completed.
00343  */
00344 static void PortResetComplete( void )
00345 {
00346   if ( USB->HPRT & USB_HPRT_PRTCONNSTS ) /* Is device still connected ? */
00347   {
00348     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '5' );
00349   }
00350   else
00351   {
00352     USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_DISCONNECTED;
00353   }
00354   USBHHAL_PortReset( false );
00355 }
00356 
00357 /*
00358  * Callback function for port interrupt state machine.
00359  * Called on timeout of the port timer connection debounce time has expired.
00360  */
00361 static void PortDebounceComplete( void )
00362 {
00363   uint32_t hprt;
00364 
00365   hprt = USB->HPRT;                   /* Get port status */
00366 
00367   if ( hprt & USB_HPRT_PRTCONNSTS )   /* Is device still connected ? */
00368   {
00369     if ( ( hprt & _USB_HPRT_PRTSPD_MASK ) == HPRT_L_SPEED )
00370     {
00371       DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '3' );
00372       USB->HFIR = 6000;
00373       /* Set 6 MHz PHY clock */
00374       USB->HCFG = ( USB->HCFG & ~_USB_HCFG_FSLSPCLKSEL_MASK ) |
00375                   ( 2 << _USB_HCFG_FSLSPCLKSEL_SHIFT        );
00376     }
00377     else if ( ( hprt & _USB_HPRT_PRTSPD_MASK ) == HPRT_F_SPEED )
00378     {
00379       DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '4' );
00380       USB->HFIR = 48000;
00381       /* Set 48 MHz PHY clock */
00382       USB->HCFG = ( USB->HCFG & ~_USB_HCFG_FSLSPCLKSEL_MASK ) |
00383                   ( 1 << _USB_HCFG_FSLSPCLKSEL_SHIFT        );
00384     }
00385 
00386     USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_CONNECTED_RESETTING;
00387     USBTIMER_Start( HOSTPORT_TIMER_INDEX,
00388                     USBH_attachTiming[ USBH_attachRetryCount ].resetTime,
00389                     PortResetComplete );
00390     USBHHAL_PortReset( true );
00391   }
00392   else
00393   {
00394     USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_DISCONNECTED;
00395   }
00396 }
00397 
00398 /*
00399  * Handle port interrupt.
00400  */
00401 static void Handle_USB_GINTSTS_PRTINT( void )
00402 {
00403   uint32_t hprt;
00404 
00405   hprt = USB->HPRT;                               /* Get port status */
00406 
00407   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '^' );
00408 
00409   switch ( USBH_portStatus )
00410   {
00411     case H_PORT_DISCONNECTED:
00412     /***********************/
00413       if ( ( hprt & USB_HPRT_PRTCONNDET ) &&
00414            ( hprt & USB_HPRT_PRTCONNSTS )    )    /* Any device connected ? */
00415       {
00416         DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '2' );
00417         USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_CONNECTED_DEBOUNCING;
00418         USBTIMER_Start( HOSTPORT_TIMER_INDEX,
00419                         USBH_attachTiming[ USBH_attachRetryCount ].debounceTime,
00420                         PortDebounceComplete );
00421       }
00422       break;
00423 
00424     case H_PORT_CONNECTED_DEBOUNCING:
00425     /***********************/
00426       DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( 'Y' );
00427       break;
00428 
00429     case H_PORT_CONNECTED_RESETTING:
00430     /***********************/
00431       if ( ( hprt & USB_HPRT_PRTENCHNG  ) &&    /* Port enable changed ?    */
00432            ( hprt & USB_HPRT_PRTENA     ) &&    /* Port enabled ?           */
00433            ( hprt & USB_HPRT_PRTCONNSTS )    )  /* Device still connected ? */
00434       {
00435         DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '6' );
00436         USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_CONNECTED;
00437       }
00438       break;
00439 
00440     case H_PORT_CONNECTED:
00441     /***********************/
00442       if ( (    hprt & USB_HPRT_PRTENCHNG ) &&
00443            ( !( hprt & USB_HPRT_PRTENA )  )    )
00444       {
00445         DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( 'X' );
00446 #if ( USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT != USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT_NONE )
00447         if ( GPIO_PinInGet( USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT, USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PIN ) ==
00448              USB_VBUSOVRCUR_POLARITY )
00449         {
00450           DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '~' );
00451           USBHHAL_PortReset( false );
00452           USBHHAL_VbusOn( false );
00453           USBTIMER_Stop( HOSTPORT_TIMER_INDEX );
00454           USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_OVERCURRENT;
00455         }
00456 #endif
00457       }
00458       break;
00459 
00460     case H_PORT_OVERCURRENT:
00461     /***********************/
00462       break;
00463   }
00464 
00465   if ( hprt & USB_HPRT_PRTOVRCURRCHNG ) /* Overcurrent change interrupt ? */
00466   {
00467     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '9' );
00468   }
00469 
00470   hprt &= ~HPRT_WC_MASK;              /* Mask off all write clear bits  */
00471   hprt |= USB_HPRT_PRTCONNDET | USB_HPRT_PRTENCHNG | USB_HPRT_PRTOVRCURRCHNG;
00472   USB->HPRT = hprt;                   /* Clear all port interrupt flags */
00473 }
00474 
00477 #endif /* defined( USB_HOST ) */
00478 #endif /* defined( USB_PRESENT ) && ( USB_COUNT == 1 ) */
